item.title: How do you know the php.ini used via CLI
item.description: 1<?php 2$inipath = php_ini_loaded_file(); 3if ($inipath) { 4echo 'Loaded php.ini: ' . $inipath; 5} else { 6echo 'A php.ini file is not loaded'; 7} 8?> or 1[icasimpan!@example.org ~]$ php -i |grep php.ini 2Configuration File (php.ini) Path => /etc 3Loaded Configuration File => /etc/php.ini But not that server and CLI used php.ini could be different. Details in https://stackoverflow.com/questions/14558150/how-to-know-which-php-ini-is-used
